item.title: OR-140 East at OR-39
item.description: OR-140 East at OR-39 in Klamath County. Turn right for OR-39 south to Merrill. Turn left for OR-140 East (Unsigned)/OR-39 North to Klamath Falls and Lakeview.

item.title: OR-140 West Approaching OR-39
item.description: OR-140 West approaching OR-39. Use OR-39 south for Merrill; use OR-39 North/OR-140 East for Klamath Falls, Lakeview, and Klamath Falls Community College. OR-140 east joins OR-39 north.

item.title: OR-140 East Approaching OR-39
item.description: OR-140 East approaching OR-39.

item.title: Washburn Way South at OR-140 East
item.description: Washburn Way South at OR-140 East. Use OR-140 east for OR-39 and Merrill. Continue south on Washburn Way for Kingsley Field.

item.title: Washburn Way South at OR-140 West
item.description: Washburn Way south at OR-140 west to Medford, and US-97. Continue south on Washburn Way for Kingsley Field and Merrill.

item.title: OR-140 West at OR-39
item.description: OR-140 west at OR-39 near Klamath Falls. Turn right for OR-39 north to Klamath Falls and Bend. Continue straight for OR-39 South/OR-140 West to Merrill (OR-39) and Medford (OR-140).

item.title: OR-140 West Approaching OR-39
item.description: OR-140 West Approaching OR-39 to Klamath Falls, Merril, and Medford. OR-140 joins OR-39 south.

item.title: OR-140 West - Olene
item.description: Entering Olene on OR-140 west.

item.title: OR-140 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on OR-140 west. Distance to Olene and Klamath Falls.

item.title: OR-140 West at OR-70
item.description: OR-140 West at OR-70 East to Bonanza and Lorella.

item.title: OR-140 West Approaching OR-70
item.description: OR-140 West approaching OR-70 in Dairy.

item.title: OR-140 West - Dairy
item.description: Entering Dairy on OR-140 west.

item.title: OR-140 West - Bonanza Junction
item.description: OR-140 west approaching Bonanza Junction.

item.title: OR-140 West - Bly Mountain Pass
item.description: OR-140 west at Bly Mountain Pass. Elevation 5085 Feet.

item.title: OR-140 West - Beatty
item.description: Entering Beatty on OR-140 west.

item.title: OR-140 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on OR-140 east leaving Bly. Distance to Beatty and Klamath Falls.

item.title: OR-140 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on OR-140 west. Distance to Bly and Klamath Falls.

item.title: US-395 South/OR-140 West Approaching Split
item.description: US-395 South/OR-140 West approaching US-395/OR-140 split. Turn right for OR-140 west to Klamath Falls. Turn left for US-395 to Downtown (Lakeview).

item.title: US-395 South Approaching OR-140
item.description: US-395 south approaching OR-140. OR-140 west joins US-395 south into Lakeview.

item.title: OR-140 West - Welcome To Oregon
item.description: Welcome to Oregon on OR-140 west. Taken at the Oregon-Nevada State Line.

item.title: OR-140 East - Entering Harney County
item.description: Entering Harney County on OR-140 east. Taken at the Harney-Lake County Line. OR-140 briefly enters Harney County before leaving Oregon.

item.title: OR-140 East - Summit - Doherty Rim
item.description: Doherty Rim Summit, Elevation 6,240 Feet on OR-140 east in rural Lake County.

item.title: OR-140 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker to Denio and Winnemucca (both in Nevada) along OR-140 east, leaving Adel.

item.title: OR-140 East - Denio and Winnemucca
item.description: Use OR-140 east to Denio and Winnemucca (both in Nevada) in Adel.

item.title: Twentymile Road North at OR-140
item.description: Twentymile Road north at OR-140 in Adel. Turn right on OR-140 for Denio and Winnemucca (both in Nevada). Westbound destinations on fingerboard are broken off.

item.title: OR-140 East - Entering Adel
item.description: Entering Adel on OR-140 east. Adel is a small community in southeastern Lake County, Oregon. The OR-140 shield is incorrectly signed with a US highway type marker.

item.title: OR-140 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on OR-140 east. Distance to Adel and Winnemucca (Nevada).

item.title: OR-140 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on OR-140 east. Distance to Adel, Plush, and Winnemucca (Nevada). In the background is an OR-140 shield. This was taken just east of the US-395/OR-140 junction.

item.title: US-395 North/OR-140 East at Split
item.description: US-395 North/OR-140 East at US-395/OR-140 split. Turn right for OR-140 east to Adel, Plush, and Winnemucca (Nevada). Continue north on US-395 for Burns and Bend. US-395 is part of the Oregon Outback Scenic Byway.

item.title: US-395 North/OR-140 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-395 North/OR-140 East. Distance to Burns and Bend.

item.title: OR-140 East at US-395
item.description: OR-140 east at US-395 junction. Turn right for US-395 south to Alturas (California). Turn left for US-395 North/OR-140 east to Burns. OR-140 east joins US-395 north through Lakeview.

item.title: US-395 South/OR-140 West Approaching Split
item.description: US-395 South/OR-140 West approaching US-395/OR-140 split. Turn right for OR-140 west to Klamath Falls. Turn left for US-395 to Downtown (Lakeview).

item.title: OR-140 West at US-395
item.description: OR-140 west at US-395. OR-140 west joins US-395 south into Lakeview. Use US-395 north for Burns and Bend. Use US-395 South/OR-140 West for Lakeview and Klamath Falls.

item.title: US-395 South OR-140
item.description: US-395 South at OR-140. Use OR-140 east for Adel, Plush, and Winnemucca (Nevada). OR-140 west joins US-395 into Lakeview.

item.title: US-395 South Approaching OR-140
item.description: US-395 south approaching OR-140 east to Adel and Winnemucca (Nevada).

item.title: Washburn Way North at OR-140 West
item.description: Washburn Way north at OR-140 west to Medford and Bend, and US-97. Continue north on Washburn Way for City Center (Klamath Falls). The OR-140 shield is incorrectly represented as a US shield.

item.title: OR-140 East - Exit 3
item.description: OR-140 east at Exit 3 - Washburn Way. OR-140 crosses south of Klamath Falls proper along the Southside Expressway.

item.title: OR-140 East at US-97 North
item.description: OR-140 east at US-97 north. Use US-97 north of Klamath Falls and Bend. Continue east on OR-140 for Lakeview, and OR-39 to Merill. OR-140 meets OR-39 on the east side of Klamath Falls.

item.title: US-97 South at OR-66/OR-140
item.description: US-97 south at OR-66/OR-140 junction. Use OR-66/OR-140 west for Keno, Ashland, and Medford. Use OR-140 east for Lakeview. This is the eastern end of OR-66.

item.title: US-97 South - Exit 277
item.description: US-97 south approaching Exit 277 - OR-66/OR-140/Lakeview/Medford.

item.title: US-97 South Overhead
item.description: Distance marker on US-97 south for Weed, and OR-66/OR-140 junction. Leaving the city of Klamath Falls.

item.title: Jct. OR-140 East on US-395 North
item.description: US-395 North/OR-140 East approaching US-395/OR-140 split. Use OR-140 east to Adel and Winnemucca (Nevada).

item.title: US-395 North Approaching OR-140
item.description: US-395/OR-140 shields in Lake County.

item.title: US-395 North at OR-140
item.description: US-395 north at OR-140 west junction to Klamath Falls in Lakeview.

item.title: US-395 North at OR-140 East
item.description: OR-140 to Plush, Adel, and Winnmucca on US-395 north in Lake County.

item.title: US-395 North/OR-140 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-395 north/OR-140 east in Lakeview.

item.title: US-395 South/OR-140 West Split
item.description: US-395 South/OR-140 West split in Lakeview. Turn right for OR-140 west; left for US-395 south.
